reference.shortdesc: The virtual metronome state change callback.

p.codeblock: public void onRhythmPlayerStateChanged(int state, int errorCode) {}

section.p: When the state of the virtual metronome changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the current state of the virtual metronome. This callback indicates the state of the local audio stream, and allows you to troubleshoot issues when audio exceptions occur.
section.note: This callback is for Android and iOS only.

Error codes and error messages for virtual metronome errors.
(0): The beat files are played normally without errors.
